title: History of FCA governance | Farm Credit Administration
snippet: Marsha Pyle Martin was appointed to the FCA board by President William J. Clinton and also was named chairman and chief executive officer. She was the first woman in FCA’s history to lead the agency.

title: Nikhil Rathi - Wikipedia
snippet: Nikhil Rathi (born 5 August 1979) is a British financial regulator who has served as the chief executive of the United Kingdom's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) since 2020.

title: FCA board | Farm Credit Administration
snippet: FCA’s mission is to ensure that Farm Credit System institutions and Farmer Mac are safe, sound, and dependable sources of credit and related services for all creditworthy and eligible persons in agriculture and rural America. title: Ashley Alder appointed as Chair of the Financial Conduct Authority - GOV.UK
snippet: HM Treasury has today (Friday 8 July) announced the appointment of Ashley Alder as Chair of the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).

title: Executive Team
snippet: The executive team of FCA is led by our President and other executives who carry the vision of the FCA sports ministry.
